root.message: The CLASS_SYSTEM field for indicator 8-3-1, translated into all languages

languages.language: The breakdown by sector is based on the International Standard Industrial Classification of All Economic Activities (ISIC). Agriculture corresponds to ISIC Rev. 4 section A, Rev. 3 sections A and B, and Rev.2 section 1 and non-agriculture corresponds to Rev. 4 sections B-U, Rev. 3 sections C-Q, and Rev. 2 sections 2-9.
